name: ProjectN
description:
Controls:

Arrows - Movement

Z - Jump( you have double jump and you can control character`s jump height)

X - Shoot forward(autofired is enabled)

C - Shoot up(autofire is enabled)

Tips:

Enemies with red box inside their sprite destroy all the bullets on the screen when you kill them.

Red-colored enemies are immortal.

You get hit colliding with  BULLETS, not enemies!

Music: AN - 六花輪翔
